mdRecord.dcterms:description: Deathly Hallows symbol from Harry Potter. Philosophical observations. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
The text within this image may be offensive to some.
You are free | You are truly free | I wanna bang my ex-girlfriend--it's been a year - Lonely Geed | ANYONE GOT WEED? yeah | GO FAST EAT ASS
